Based on the preferences and interests provided, I would recommend "Arthur Christmas" to the user.

The movie is about a real estate developer's new housing development that faces a unique group of protestors: local woodland creatures who don't want their homes disturbed.

As the protagonist Arthur Christmas sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a misplaced present to a young girl in less than two hours on Christmas Day, he encounters various obstacles and challenges along his journey.

Despite these setbacks and obstacles, Arthur Christmas perseveres and ultimately achieves his goal of giving out the misplaced present to the young girl.
